original_text: But if you have gone astray while married to your husband and you have made yourself impure by having sexual relations with a man other than your husband”—
korean_text: 그러나 네가 네 남편을 두고 탈선하여 몸을 더럽혀서 네 남편 아닌 사람과 동침하였으면

sentences.original_text: But if you have gone astray while married to your husband
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신이 남편과 결혼한 상태에서 길을 잃었다면

sentences.original_text: and you have made yourself impure
by having sexual relations with a man other than your husband
sentences.korean_translation: 남편이 아닌 다른 남자와 성관계를 가짐으로써
